      • similar

        public static boolean similar(java.util.List<java.lang.String> sentence1,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> sentence2,
                              java.lang.Double threshold)
        Decides whether two sentences are similar based on a similarity threshold.
        Parameters:
        sentence1 - list of words in sentence 1
        sentence2 - list of words in sentence 2
        threshold - the threshold used in decision
        Returns:
        true if they are similar, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • termsStats

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> termsStats(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> sentWords)
        Gives some statistics about the different terms in a text.
        Parameters:
        sentWords - list of sentence where a sentence is a list of words
        Returns:
        a list of integers:
        • the first element (index 0) is the number of different terms in the document
        • the second element is the sum of numbers of different terms in each sentence
        • the third element is the frequency of the most repeated term

      • termsDistribution

        public static double termsDistribution(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> sentWords)
        Calculates the terms distribution in a text. The terms distribution in a document D is the sum of the numbers of different terms in each sentence divided by the number of different terms in D

        TD = (∑i |si|)/|D|
        where:

        • |D| is number of different terms in the source document
        • |si| is number of different terms in the sentence si

        Parameters:
        sentWords - list of sentence where a sentence is a list of words
        Returns:
        terms' distribution

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
